JUDPServerReceive

public JUDPServerReceive(java.net.DatagramSocket socket)
Constructor for the UDP receive loop. Also creates a list to store the connected clients in.

socket - the socket to receive messages on.

removeClient

Parameters:
id - the id of the client to remove.

recieveMessage

public void recieveMessage()
Receives messages on the UDP socket. Works out if the ip and port have sent a message before, if the ip and port have been used, store the message in the clients id. else add a new client to the client list.
